name: GET THE JUICE BOX!
description: a simple shooter game with your favourite 3 spooky monsters, zombies, skeletons and ghosts! i mean, technically 2 because when you kill a zombie it turns into a skeleton, yeah, i kinda tried to poorly implement the theme into this game. also this is my first game-jam game! the idea is that you are supposed to  fight enemies in a graveyard/nightscape with a big, white glowing moon. yknow, like those old antique pictures with an enhanced moon  that your grandma probably hoards in her creepy rustic attic.
